document.contentSummary: The couple will soon celebrate 11 years of marriage, so to celebrate, we're looking back at some of Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban’s most amazing moments!
document.pageTitle: Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban's love through the years
document.pageMetaDescription: Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban will soon celebrate 11 years of marriage, so to celebrate, we're looking back at some of their most amazing moments! | Australian Women's Weekly content brought to you by Now to Love
document.contentFacebookImageUrl: {"source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483591182056_fb-1.jpg","valid":true,"caption":"Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban's love through the years","title":"Relive the couple's love story, in their own words."}
document.contentBody:
[{"type":"paragraph","label":"Paragraph","content":"It’s hard to believe it’s been 10 years since Nicole Kidman wed Keith Urban in a moving ceremony on the stunning grounds of St Patrick's Estate in Sydney’s iconic Manly.

Since then, the couple have welcomed two beautiful daughters, Sunday Rose, eight, and Faith Margaret, six, and their fairytale romance only continues to soar.

Their only regret is that their paths didn’t cross sooner.

“I wish I could have met him much earlier and had way more children with him, but I didn’t. I mean, if I could have had two more children with him that would have been just glorious,” Nicole told *Vogue* in celebration of their milestone.

And the sentiment is echoed by Keith, who describes the actress as “an amazing wife and mother” who also doubles as his “best friend”.

**As the couple celebrate 11 years of marriage later this year, we take a look at some of Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban’s most amazing moments!**"}]
document.contentGallery: [{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483588840259_1435296425419nicole-Kidman-and-Keith-Urban-celebrate-9-years-marriage-7.jpg","caption":"Speaking to Ellen DeGeneres of the first time they met, Nicole admitted, “I'm like, 'You didn't love me at first sight, you didn't notice me,' and he's like, 'Yes I did but I just didn't let on,' but we kind of met and then about four months later he called me.\" **WATCH Keith tell his side of the story in the next slide...**","title":"1435296425419_nicole-Kidman-and-Keith-Urban-celebrate-9-years-marriage-7.jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"videoId":"4887912935001","brightcoveId":"4887912935001","videoTitle":"","open":false,"mediaType":"video","valid":true,"ispoen":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483589796852_sit.jpg","caption":"Still so in love... The couple seize every moment to be affectionate with each other.","title":"sit.jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483588840262_1435296425422nicole-Kidman-and-Keith-Urban-celebrate-9-years-marriage-8.jpg","caption":"Speaking to 2day FM radio hosts Rove McManus and Sam Frost, the *Fighter* hitmaker confessed that a strong friendship comes first. “We just love being together, more than anything,” he said, adding, “We’re just like best friends.”","title":"1435296425422_nicole-Kidman-and-Keith-Urban-celebrate-9-years-marriage-8.jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483588840239_1435296425402nicole-Kidman-and-Keith-Urban-celebrate-9-years-marriage-3.jpg","caption":"“That’s it, we’re the priority and everything else comes after that.” **See the sweet moment in the next slide!**","title":"1435296425402_nicole-Kidman-and-Keith-Urban-celebrate-9-years-marriage-3.jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"videoId":"5147849495001","brightcoveId":"5147849495001","videoTitle":"","open":false,"mediaType":"video","valid":true,"ispoen":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483589796848_dance.jpg","caption":"Speaking of her adoration for his music, Nicole once mused: \"I looked up at him at one point and I saw his tattoos and his foot going, and he had the guitar, and I was like, 'God, I love that man. I'm so glad I'm in this world.'\"","title":"dance.jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483588840269_1462236377190Nicole.jpg","caption":"Keith says he feels like the \"like the luckiest guy on the planet\" when he's with his wife.","title":"1462236377190_Nicole.jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483588840256_1435296425406nicole-Kidman-and-Keith-Urban-celebrate-9-years-marriage-4.jpg","caption":"Nicole, who already shares two wonderful girls with her husband, would love to expand their brood. \"I had my last one at 43. My grandmother had her last at 49. Every month, I'm like, 'I hope I'm pregnant!\"","title":"1435296425406_nicole-Kidman-and-Keith-Urban-celebrate-9-years-marriage-4.jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483588840288_Head.jpg","caption":"“We’re pretty goofy,” Keith told *People* of their sense of humour. “I mean there’s no question that that’s what we’re like. Anybody that knows us on a personal level knows that’s exactly what we’re like most of the time.” **WATCH the pair sing-a-long in the next slide.**","title":"Head.jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"videoId":"4891082468001","brightcoveId":"4891082468001","videoTitle":"","open":false,"mediaType":"video","valid":true,"ispoen":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483589796833_back.jpg","caption":"Keith, who had previously battled drug addiction, describes meeting the strawberry blonde as the moment his life begun. “I was spiritually awoken with her. I use the expression 'I was born into her,' and that's how I feel.”","title":"back.jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483588840281_head1.jpg","caption":"The 49-year-old country singer leaves a love letter for his wife for each night spent away from her. \"For every single night he's away, he leaves me a love letter. Every single night of our relationship,\" Nic told *InStyle*.","title":"head (1).jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483589855056_1459902469750NUZZLE.jpg","caption":"The couple have perfected their red-carpet nuzzle throughout the years.","title":"Nicole-and-Keith.jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483588840272_1465282956511fam.jpg","caption":"The family's official home is in Nashville in the U.S. \"I'm very country at heart. I have a real desire to be outdoors, a desire for simplicity - a slightly slower, relaxed approach to life,\" Nic quipped.","title":"1465282956511_fam.jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":false},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/aww/2017/01/05/1483588840290_MAIN1.jpg","caption":"There's just no stopping this loved-up power couple.","title":"MAIN (1).jpg","valid":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":[],"open":true}]
